mapper.insert: insert into t_infusionpack (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, PERSONQRCODE, NAME, AVATAR, AGE, SEX, CREATEDAT, STARTAT, FINISHAT, DEPART, DOCTOR, DIAGNOSE, TOTALINJECTTIMES, LOCALINJECTTIMES, FINISHINJECTTIMES, RECEIPTNO, CLINICNO, PRESCRIPTIONNO, STATUS, STATUSTEXT, AREANO, SEATNO, ORDERNO, CARDNUMBER, INSTANCEID ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personqrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{depart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalinjecttimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{localinjecttimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finishinjecttimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiptno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clinicno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prescriptionno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statustext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areano,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instanceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_infusionpack set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSONQRCODE = #{personqrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVATAR = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGE = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDAT = #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STARTAT = #{startat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FINISHAT = #{finishat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEPART = #{depart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCTOR = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIAGNOSE = #{diagnose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTALINJECTTIMES = #{totalinjecttimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LOCALINJECTTIMES = #{localinjecttimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FINISHINJECTTIMES = #{finishinjecttimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RECEIPTNO = #{receiptno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLINICNO = #{clinicno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRESCRIPTIONNO = #{prescriptionno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUSTEXT = #{statustext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREANO = #{areano,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEATNO = #{seatno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERNO = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARDNUMBER = #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSTANCEID = #{instanceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, PERSONQRCODE, NAME, AVATAR, AGE, SEX, CREATEDAT, STARTAT, FINISHAT, DEPART, DOCTOR, DIAGNOSE, TOTALINJECTTIMES, LOCALINJECTTIMES, FINISHINJECTTIMES, RECEIPTNO, CLINICNO, PRESCRIPTIONNO, STATUS, STATUSTEXT, AREANO, SEATNO, ORDERNO, CARDNUMBER, INSTANCEID from t_infusionpack where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, PERSONQRCODE, NAME, AVATAR, AGE, SEX, CREATEDAT, STARTAT, FINISHAT, DEPART, DOCTOR, DIAGNOSE, TOTALINJECTTIMES, LOCALINJECTTIMES, FINISHINJECTTIMES, RECEIPTNO, CLINICNO, PRESCRIPTIONNO, STATUS, STATUSTEXT, AREANO, SEATNO, ORDERNO, CARDNUMBER, INSTANCEID from t_infusionpack
